page_content: The page provides information on regulations and safety measures for solarium businesses in Switzerland.
The page discusses the conclusion of an investigation into a COVID-19 related death in Jona, Switzerland.
The page discusses the use of sensor technology and software for precise soil cultivation in agriculture.
The page offers guidelines and recommendations for ensuring safety during physical education classes in schools.
The page discusses the government's stance on the duration for covering COVID-19 test costs for the issuance of a Covid certificate.
The page highlights the extensive collection of images available in the catalog of the State Archives of St. Gallen.
